snippet: Gunmen suspected of being members of the extremist group Boko Haram in Nigeria kidnapped dozens of people and killed three others on Sunday in a cross-border attack on villages in northern Cameroon, officials in Cameroon said.
abstract: Officials in Cameroon say suspected Boko Haram extremists from Nigeria kidnapped dozens of people and killed three others in cross-border raid in northern Cameroon.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen suspected of being members of the extremist group Boko Haram in Nigeria kidnapped dozens of people and killed three others on Sunday in a cross-border attack on villages in northern Cameroon, officials in Cameroon said.
